subSections.title: Definitions
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|ã¾|yomi=k}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=ã¾|-}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> Older, unbound form of {{m|ja|ç›®|tr=me<sub>2</sub>}}. Cognate with {{m|ja|è¦‹ã‚‹|tr=miru||to see}}. Never found in isolation in modern Japanese. Remains as the first syllable of various compounds.
